headline: What Kimco Realty (KIM)'s Dividend Hike, Buyback Completion and 2026 Guidance Means For Shareholders
summary: Kimco Realty recently reported past fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results showing higher revenue and full-year net income, alongside updated 2026 net income guidance of US$0.80 to US$0.84 per common share. The company also raised its common dividend by 4.0%, completed a US$195.58 million share repurchase program, and affirmed quarterly preferred dividends, underscoring a continued focus on shareholder returns. Now, we'll assess how the higher dividend and completed buyback influence...
